# CCowSay

![screenshot](./screenshot.png)

<p align="center">
    <em>üêÆ A program that generates customizable ASCII art pictures with a message.</em>
</p>

## Installation

1. **[Install Pipx](https://gist.github.com/ashkanfeyzollahi/7bbf36fb876a3781efbbb3ef841b5f4e)** (if you don't have it already)

2. **Install `ccowsay` using Pipx**:

```bash
pipx install ccowsay
```

## Usage

```
Usage: ccowsay [OPTIONS] [MESSAGE]

  ccowsay is a program that generates customizable ASCII art pictures with a
  message.

Options:
  -a, --align [CENTER|LEFT|RIGHT]
  -w, --box-width INTEGER
  --help                          Show this message and exit.
```
